query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dailyLoginRewards (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  lastLoginDate DATE NOT NULL,
  loginStreak INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  totalLogins INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS seasonalEvents (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  gameMode VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  startDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  endDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  rewards JSON,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT true NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS userReferrals (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  referrerId INT NOT NULL,
  referredUserId INT,
  referralCode VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  rewardsClaimed BOOLEAN DEFAULT false NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS seasonalEvents (
